frontmatter.description: Back in early 2008, I made a very bold decision to move from Windows to OSX and I must say, I am very happy that I made this transition. Some of the reasons that you might consider to switch to OSX (especially if you've been using Windows).
frontmatter.title: Why you should consider OS X?

frontmatter.description: Last month, I've changed the admin password for this modem. Originally it was username: `tmadmin` and password: `tmadmin`. This is the unrestricted account.
frontmatter.title: How to recover admin password for Streamyx (Modem DSL-2640B)
